Startups & Funding.title: Radhakishan Damani invests ₹90 crore in Lenskart ahead of IPO
Startups & Funding.summary: The eyewear retailer, one of India’s largest omni-channel brands, is set to launch its maiden public offering next week, aiming to raise Rs 2,150 crore via fresh equity issuance while promoters and investors plan to offload 13.22 crore shares.

Banking & Finance.title: RBI to cap bank lending for corporate takeovers at 70% of deal value
Banking & Finance.summary: Under the proposed rules, banks can finance up to 70 per cent of the acquisition value, with the balance 30 per cent to be funded by the acquiring company through its own equity.

Banking & Finance.title: RBI proposes lower risk weight on NBFCs’ infra loans
Banking & Finance.summary: The RBI has sought public feedback on the proposed changes by November 21, 2025 and said the changes will be applicable from April 1, 2026, or from an earlier date when adopted by a NBFC in entirety

Banking & Finance.summary: India's forex reserves increase by $4.49 billion as the RBI prioritizes gold purchases over US bonds.
